colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @046A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I DKYIL 'KHOR BSGRUB CING MCHOD DE BDAG 'JUG BLANG BA'I TSUL LAS, BSGRUB MCHOD @046B BYA BA'I TSUL YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I MNGA BDAG ,RDO RJE 'CHANG NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN DPAL BZANG POS, KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SHAR TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS MDZAD PA'I DKYIL CHO GA RIN CHEN PHRENG BA NAS BSHAD PA BZHIN ZA MA TOG GI LHAN THABS SU GSUNG BA LTAR DANG, BUM CHOG KYANG DKYIL CHO GA DE NYID NAS BSHAD PA CI LTA BA BZHIN RAB GNAS BKRA SHIS SNYE MA'I LHAN THABS SU GSUNG BA LTAR LA, BDAG 'JUG GI NGAG DON PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I GSUNG BZHIN, 'JUG PA BDE BA'I PHYIR PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS SHING GAL CHE BA'I DMIGS PA RNAMS MTSAN GYIS GSAL BAR BYAS PA 'DI NYID, GSUNG RAB KYI TSIG DON LA BLO GROS KYIS 'JUG PA YANGS SHING, NYAMS LEN DANG RNAM PAR DKAR @047A *, ,BA'I PHYOGS LA BRTZON PA'I LHAG BSAM DGE BA CAN, T'A BLA MA NGAG DBANG BSAM GTAN DAR RGYAS KYI NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,BTZUN GZUGS SNYOMS LAS NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO ZHES BGYI PAS, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN PO'I RGYAL KHAB PHE'ICING GI TZAN DAN JO BO'I LHA KHAN DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN BKA' BCU NGAG DBANG CHOS 'BYOR RO, ,'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
